title: ‘Angry Indian Goddesses’ gets standing ovation at Rome film fest
text: ‘Angry Indian Goddesses’ gets standing ovation at Rome film fest Sunday, 25 October 2015 (19 minutes ago) Pan Nalin’s film "Angry Indian Goddesses" (AIG) received an eight-minute long standing ovation by the critics and reviewers at the Rome Film Festival. *Pan Nalins film "Angry Indian Goddesses" (AIG) received an eight-minute long standing ovation by the critics and reviewers at the Rome Film Festival. The...
